str2: Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.
Of Chaldee origin; son of Nabas; Barnabas, an Israelite.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
Only, solitary, desolate. Probably from meno; remaining, i.e. Sole or single; by implication, mere.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.

parse: Verb - Present Infinitive Middle or Passive
str2: To work, trade, perform, do, practice, commit, acquire by labor.
